channel.description: Breaking news and in-depth analysis of the headlines, as well as commentary and informed perspectives from The Rachel Maddow Show, Morning Joe & more.
channel.title: msnbc.com Latest Headlines

item.title: One on One with Secretary of State Mike Pompeo
item.description: Hugh Hewitt joins Secretary of State Mike Pompeo, to discuss the historic North Korea Summit, the Immigration Policy at the border, and so much more, tune in to find out what they talked about, exclusively on Hugh Hewitt’s show.
item.content:encoded:
Hugh Hewitt joins Secretary of State Mike Pompeo, to discuss the historic North Korea Summit, the Immigration Policy at the border, and so much more, tune in to find out what they talked about, exclusively on Hugh Hewitt’s show.

Read more

item.title: This Week in God, 6.23.18
item.description: As if Attorney General Jeff Sessions weren't dealing with enough troubles, he's now being accused by fellow United Methodists of violating his church's laws.
item.content:encoded:
As if Attorney General Jeff Sessions weren't dealing with enough troubles, he's now being accused by fellow United Methodists of violating his church's laws.

Read more
item.dc:creator: Steve Benen

item.title: Trump predicts a ‘Red Wave’ this fall. Is that possible?
item.description: Our Steve Kornacki talks us through how the different races look for Republicans & Democrats this fall and the possible changes in the balance of power on Capitol Hill.
item.content:encoded:
Our Steve Kornacki talks us through how the different races look for Republicans & Democrats this fall and the possible changes in the balance of power on Capitol Hill.

Read more

item.title: Michael Cohen still may flip… & what Tom Arnold has to do with it
item.description: Reports still indicate former Trump attorney Michael Cohen – who’s been seen in pictures on Twitter with comedian Tom Arnold who’s working on an anti-Trump program – could still flip on Pres. Trump and cooperate with the Feds. Mimi Rocah & Josh Gerstein
item.content:encoded:
Reports still indicate former Trump attorney Michael Cohen – who’s been seen in pictures on Twitter with comedian Tom Arnold who’s working on an anti-Trump program – could still flip on Pres. Trump and cooperate with the Feds. Mimi Rocah & Josh Gerstein

Read more

item.title: Trump: GOP can fix immigration after 'Red Wave' in fall elections
item.description: The president says Republicans on the Hill should stop ‘wasting their time’ on immigration until the fall midterm elections, predicting Republicans will pick up seats on Capitol Hill. Franco Ordoñez, Katie Benner, & Yamiche Alcindor join to discuss.
item.content:encoded:
The president says Republicans on the Hill should stop ‘wasting their time’ on immigration until the fall midterm elections, predicting Republicans will pick up seats on Capitol Hill. Franco Ordoñez, Katie Benner, & Yamiche Alcindor join to discuss.

Read more

item.title: Tom Arnold says Michael Cohen is cooperating '100%' with prosecutors
item.description: Lawrence gets Tom Arnold to answer questions about Michael Cohen- and Tom Arnold says Michael Cohen will tell the truth about Donald Trump.
item.content:encoded:
Lawrence gets Tom Arnold to answer questions about Michael Cohen- and Tom Arnold says Michael Cohen will tell the truth about Donald Trump.

item.title: Soboroff border special to air Sunday at 7pm on NBC
item.description: Jacob Soboroff, MSNBC correspondent, talks about his reporting from the border this week and his hour-long special to air this Sunday surveying the effects of Donald Trump's family separation policy.
item.content:encoded:
Jacob Soboroff, MSNBC correspondent, talks about his reporting from the border this week and his hour-long special to air this Sunday surveying the effects of Donald Trump's family separation policy.

item.title: Odd Russian behavior in U.S. seen as part of 2016 active measures
item.description: Michael McFaul, former U.S. ambassador to Russia, talks about how Russian spy operations against the U.S. are significantly more aggressive since their interference in the 2016 election.
item.content:encoded:
Michael McFaul, former U.S. ambassador to Russia, talks about how Russian spy operations against the U.S. are significantly more aggressive since their interference in the 2016 election.

item.title: Tom Arnold suggests Michael Cohen has turned on Trump
item.description: "This dude has all the tapes - this dude has everything."
item.content:encoded:
"This dude has all the tapes - this dude has everything."

item.title: Immigration and Trump’s America
item.description: In the midst of a national moral emergency over the government’s policy of tearing migrant children away from their parent’s, the president of United States referred to those same migrants as vermin.
item.content:encoded:
In the midst of a national moral emergency over the government’s policy of tearing migrant children away from their parent’s, the president of United States referred to those same migrants as vermin.
